<% if(db_type == "mysql"){ %>
select * from pt_userinfo order by ids asc limit ? offset ?
<% } else if(db_type == "postgresql"){ %>
select * from pt_userinfo order by ids asc limit ? offset ?
<% } else if(db_type == "oracle"){ %>
select * from ( select a.*, rownum rn from (select * from pt_userinfo) a where rownum <= ? ) where rn >= ?
<% } %>
